channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: df87f177-bb12-4db1-9793-a413691eff94
Display name: Container Registry Cache Rule Administrator
Description: Create, Read, Update, and Delete Cache Rules in Container Registry. This role doesn't grant permissions to manage Credential Sets.
Link: https://management.azure.com/df87f177-bb12-4db1-9793-a413691eff94?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: c357b964-0002-4b64-a50d-7a28f02edc52
Display name: Container Registry Cache Rule Reader
Description: Read the configuration of Cache Rules in Container Registry. This permission doesn't grant permission to read Credential Sets.
Link: https://management.azure.com/c357b964-0002-4b64-a50d-7a28f02edc52?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: f094fb07-0703-4400-ad6a-e16dd8000e14
Display name: Container Registry Credential Set Administrator
Description: Create, Read, Update, and Delete Credential Sets in Container Registry. This role doesn't affect the needed permissions for storing content inside Azure Key Vault. This role also doesn't grant permissions to manage Cache Rules.
Link: https://management.azure.com/f094fb07-0703-4400-ad6a-e16dd8000e14?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 29093635-9924-4f2c-913b-650a12949526
Display name: Container Registry Credential Set Reader
Description: Read the configuration of Credential Sets in Container Registry. This permission doesn't allow permission to see content inside Azure Key vault only the content inside Container Registry. This permission doesn't grant permission to read Cache Rules.
Link: https://management.azure.com/29093635-9924-4f2c-913b-650a12949526?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 8d7ecc5c-f27b-43cf-883f-46409d445502
Display name: Issue Contributor
Description: Can read all issues data and update issues settings.
Link: https://management.azure.com/8d7ecc5c-f27b-43cf-883f-46409d445502?api-version=2022-04-01
